website_summaries.verdict: The option to use the convection oven is a nice feature, and the microwave itself is spacious and powerful.
pros: The combination microwave/convection oven is appealing to those who find that some microwaved food comes out soggy
1.5 cubic feet offer enough space to fulfill the needs of average-sized families
Spacious enough to fit some larger dishes
The built-in Smart Sensor technology can detect the humidity level of food and self-adjust the power level if necessary
cons: Some users report the carousel turntable will become unstable and wobble with small or uncentered food items

website_summaries.verdict: An easy-to-use convection microwave that offers several presets and a great way to bake without heating up your entire house.
pros: Stainless steel interior and exterior are easy to clean
6 presets including pizza, potatoes, and vegetables, along with sensor cooking
Includes a grill rack for use with the convection setting, which cooks from 175°F to 425°F
cons: Food takes a little longer to bake than in a traditional oven

website_summaries.verdict: A feature-rich microwave that proves you don't have to give up a lot of counter space for a fast, efficient appliance.
pros: Despite its relatively modest footprint, this model boasts features that consumers love, including 10 preset buttons and programmable functions
Cooks at 1,000 watts of power for fast results
cons: Some reports of issues with the interior light flickering or failing

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking a great addition, but is a large oven.
customer_reviews.text: This microwave is a great addition to my appliances. After my last microwave started arcing out by the lightbulb snd tried to catch fire i searched for a replacement. The convection oven combo sealed the deal and the price was great. This oven is larger than my last one which is a plus. I i Unboxed it today and so far the microwave portion works great have not used the oven portion yet but will update as I do. Update 2/4/19: this unit has ran great! The convection oven has been used many times with no issues. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Tammyv

customer_reviews.title: It actually crisps.
customer_reviews.text: It's a microwave and as such does the job as you would expect. It is also a convection oven and does the job exquisitely. Baked potatoes ( yes an E), crisp on the outside and fluffy in the middle. Frozen pizza, Crispy bottom. What more could you ask?
customer_reviews.author: Santa Lee

customer_reviews.title: Good microwave. My daughter has baked cookies and heated ...
customer_reviews.text: Good microwave. My daughter has baked cookies and heated frozen pizza, and what else I don't know she uses it alot for the convection. I mostly use it for microwaving. It's a good microwave but there is one thing I don't like. I can't just punch in 3:30 mins. The setting is made to start at the whole number and then you can add secs in 30 sec increments. Otherwise it's pretty okee-dokey.
customer_reviews.author: Mitsuko

customer_reviews.title: You should really buy this
customer_reviews.text: I have searched and looked at reviews high and low at all the different appliance stores HSN and QVC Amazon, Amazon had exactly what I needed for the price that was what I wanted. It does everything just to perfection. I love this item recommend it to anybody.
customer_reviews.author: soloswan

customer_reviews.title: This first time i ordered this item, it arrived ...
customer_reviews.text: This first time i ordered this item, it arrived with a bashed in leg making it impossible for the unit to sit level on the counter. One leg is shorter than the other three. I returned the item and ordered a replacement. I just opened it and this one has the exact same problem. Makes me think there is an engineering problem with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Spellman

customer_reviews.title: Really loud, annoying and persistant alarm
customer_reviews.text: This has a really loud and persistent alarm each time your cooking stops. It doesn't stop no matter what, will even go on for hours if you're not at home to stop it. My neighbors have asked me to stop using it. Difficult to return, so now I have to find someone to buy it for less than I paid.
customer_reviews.author: Roy

customer_reviews.title: Got two in three months BOTH JUNK.
customer_reviews.text: This is our second Toshiba micro/conv oven we purchased. the first one lasted 1 1/2 months only to have the micro portion go out. It would get extremely hot after 7 minutes of use then shut down completely. Toshiba gave a refund. Great. got another one exact same brand and model. went to use the convection part and it does not work. runs fro 30 seconds then sounds like it kicks on then stops again. ran for 15 minutes never got hot. Stay away from these models. now i have to wait again to see who will fix or refund it.
customer_reviews.author: craig

customer_reviews.title: NOT FOR INSTALL INSIDE A CABINET OR CONFINED SPACE
customer_reviews.text: Upon opening the box, the microwave has a positively HUGE heat sink on the back. Amazon tech support was great, but Toshiba was unaccountable to provide any information regarding the safe use of this product. My application was inside a cabinet in a Travel Trailer, and definitely won't work for that...
customer_reviews.author: Charles S Delaney

customer_reviews.title: Nice but damaged
customer_reviews.text: The unit looked great, but would not sit flat on counter. Tried other surfaces and same problem. Called the support line, but was told there is no adjustment for the feed to level the unit. Was told it must have been damaged in shipping, but the box was undamaged and no physical signs of damage. Returned unit and ordered another.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Garbage - Over heats & smokes
customer_reviews.text: When food is put in to be microwaved for 7-10 minutes, the unit gets very hot. Open the door and it is smoky. It has also tripped the outlet plug twice. After only 5 minutes..The unit's lights go black and will not work for 10-15 minutes. Now when it comes back on, it does not warm the food. I agree with another reviewer - the start/stop buttons have cracked from use - very cheap control buttons. This is GARBAGE...WOULD NOT RECOMMEND PURCHASING THIS!!
customer_reviews.author: Baker50

customer_reviews.title: but the quality seems like very good
customer_reviews.text: It is bigger and heavier than I think...but the quality seems like very good! The black stainless steel looks premium and it has all the functions I normally use, and the convection is perfect and my favorite! I can cook my style chicken wings with microwave oven now.
customer_reviews.author: Devin

customer_reviews.title: Microwave is easy to use
customer_reviews.text: But the Convection side is difficult. Of course it would help if someone had a cook book out geared for this type of unit. I love the microwave. And would probably love the convection side, if I could get a recipe book for it. My wife passed away and I thought this would be the perfect size for only me. I tried downsizing regular recipes to no avail. If anyone knows of a cook book specifically geared to these kinds of ovens, please let the world and me know.
customer_reviews.author: Mark V.

customer_reviews.title: Great and not heating the kitchen
customer_reviews.text: Works like a charm, pizza in 25 min Crisp and not heating the kittchen , true love
customer_reviews.author: Larry l

customer_reviews.title: Shattered turntable
customer_reviews.text: This unit was purchased to use in a basement kitchen. It was maybe used 1 to 2 times prior to using the convection oven on the third attempt the turntable glass shattered for no apparent reason. Email attempts to customer service have gone without a response; other reviewer‘s have noted the same concern.
customer_reviews.author: Cosmo

customer_reviews.title: Great convection oven, excellent microwave
customer_reviews.text: This is remarkably good for the price. Microwave is very quiet but fast, convection oven settings cooked a 5 pound chicken perfectly. Well designed button system, very intuitive once you have the basic idea. It's bigger than it looks in the picture.
customer_reviews.author: Samuel McClellan

customer_reviews.title: Extremely Quiet
customer_reviews.text: I was really surprised by how quiet the microwave is. Not a fan of the artificial LED light inside. I hope it never goes out because I couldn't find a single thing in the manual about replacing the bulb. One other thing I found missing... where's the recipe book? Pretty much everyone knows how to use a microwave, but where are the examples of how to use the convection oven? How do you bake a cake? How to you make steak with that grilling element? How do you make a roast? How about roasting vegetables? Maybe Toshiba has something online. I need to keep looking.
customer_reviews.author: Keek, An Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking, very quiet to operate. Stainless steel interior makes cleaning easy. I used the convection function once o reheat pizza, and worked well-like my regular oven. My only issue is that the instruction booklet is very basic and doesn’t describe how to use each function -it tells you the steps (press this, enter that) but does not tell you the purpose of each function and how you might use it. It would be nice to have more details available-even if only online. I’ve posted questions, but only get preformatted answers from the manufacturer that add nothing to what is in the manual.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy

customer_reviews.title: poor quality right out of the box
customer_reviews.text: Liked stainless steel construction, seemed relatively solid. Within a month inside light started blinking like there was arcing going on in there, it was bad connection inside cabinet. 5 months out, the plastic coating on keyboard area started peeling off. Sensor cook function worked, but not as intended-took 3 separate periods of time to properly cook food. Had Panasonic for 20 years with no problems. Disappointed in this one, had wanted a Panasonic but not available from Amazon. Hope I can find something of quality. This one is CHINESE and not worth buying. Clock also periodically quit working and chronically needed to be reset. How disappointing
customer_reviews.author: Douglas J. Williams

customer_reviews.title: Love this microwave/convection oven
customer_reviews.text: I read the reviews and saw some not so good reviews but gave this a try anyway. We have not had any of the problems listed (bought in the unit in February of this year). After 8 months the inside light went out. Could not have asked for a more professional experience with their customer service. They were prompt in addressing and resolving the problem. So thank you for the experience!
customer_reviews.author: MARIANNE

customer_reviews.title: Overall really happy with purchase
customer_reviews.text: This replaced an older unit I had that was MUCH larger. I was disappointed that I was not able to find a larger unit but overall I'm really happy with this oven. It's done everything I've asked of it and it bakes perfectly. The only thing I don't like is the reminder that something is in there. Yes, I realize I could possibly forget that I was cooking dinner but not likely.
customer_reviews.author: Naggnwitch

customer_reviews.title: A KITCHEN ASSET
customer_reviews.text: Good looking. Micro aspect works well. Convection takes a long time to preheat to temp & you really do have to heat full time specified ( or slightly longer). I’m not saying that’s a negative, just have to get used to convection heating. I love that unit has two practical functions. I would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Seacoastal

customer_reviews.title: Adequate
customer_reviews.text: The microwave function of this oven works just fine. The convection function has definite limitations. I had read somewhere that a 9x13" pan would fit inside, so that is one of the reasons I chose this model. Unfortunately, though the pan does fit inside, I have not used it because the instruction book says the turntable MUST be used during baking, but the size will not allow the pan to rotate. Consequently I have only used round or 9x9" square pans for baking. Also, the oven takes a LONG time to preheat. Otherwise, I am happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Kristi Tan

customer_reviews.title: Might want to look at another brand microwave fine little cheap cheap plastic part shutter down.
customer_reviews.text: Well my love affair with it is over the device that the turntable sits on so it can roll has failed if you put anything heavy on it it's screams like a bearing going out apparently it bends over so far that the wheels just stopped and they grind around and around. Try finding a part for it. damn. Pissant little part has put it out of service and I don't know how to get another one.
customer_reviews.author: Bob

customer_reviews.title: The inside is not as large as advertised, light went out, no parts available
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking unit. I am very dissapointed in the inside cavity size though. The product details stated that the inside was 10.2" tall, and its only 9.6" tall!! Also the width is about a half inch less than they stated. I wanted to return it but wife said that we would keep it and put up with the smaller size. I would expect this from WalMart, but not Amazon. Also the rear section of the unit takes up a ton of room, and wont fit where most other ones will. In my opinion, the start button is in the wrong place, not user friendly location. Light went out after about 3 months, and cant find parts for this model.
customer_reviews.author: obars

customer_reviews.title: Poor performing microwave/convection and no light.
customer_reviews.text: The absolute worst microwave I’ve ever owned. First one arrived Aug. 18 and did not work. Made an extremely loud, grinding noise. Returned it to Amazon and received replacement. Worked ok. Microwave not very powerful and Convection took forever. Was willing to deal with it. Last month the light inside starts flickering. Now when I open the door a low light turns on but while cooking, no light whatsoever. Best part, you can’t get replacement part! Impossible. I wouldn’t give it a star at all but that’s not an option.
customer_reviews.author: Al/Jeanne, Hackensack NJ

customer_reviews.title: Didnt work out of the box.
customer_reviews.text: I plug it in... Internal light comes on, and it starts to spin... I can not press any button at all. I unplug it and try again, and again... As soon as I plug it in, light on and starts spinning. Then I read through all the 1 star reviews, and I saw a couple of people had the same issue. I had high hopes, but I guess not.
customer_reviews.author: E Campbell

customer_reviews.title: very good oven replacement if your electrical system can handle it
customer_reviews.text: Works very well as a microwave and in oven mode as well. I think the price makes it very attractive for users who do not have the room or ability to install separate ovens and microwave reheaters. There are some minor things which I miss from my previous sharp convection oven (a little smaller) but for the price it is everything I expected.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy Wittik

customer_reviews.title: 2 out of 2 haven't worked properly.
customer_reviews.text: Very nice little convection/microwave oven but the power level function didn't work on the first one so I ordered a replacement. There were three functions that didn't work on the second one so I've given up on Toshiba for ovens. If they had worked properly I would have given them 4 stars only reducing it one star for one of the poorest owners manuals I have seen. It was translated by someone not fluent in English and gave no information about combo cooking with the micro and convection at the same time. It tells how to start it but nothing to indicate if food cooks quicker or browns and no timing guides.
customer_reviews.author: Shafer

customer_reviews.title: Very quiet, but desperately needs a cookbook.
customer_reviews.text: Been using it everyday for a few months. Stainless is easy to clean. I love being able to just push a button and it begins cooking. The cooking times on microwave instructions don't require adjusting. I use the convention oven feature almost daily. It is not a "toaster" oven, but that doesn't bother me. I put the butter on my english muffin and then throw them in the oven on a pizza stone. I love how quiet this oven is.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Convenient and Easy to Clean
customer_reviews.text: This Microwave/Convection combination oven replaces a Cuisinart Combo oven I had for 3 years. I like this one much better. I use the Convection function all the time; it has an pre-heat alert when it the baking temp. Cooks evenly and comes with two different height grates so that food cooks on the bottom. Does a great job with whole chickens and small pork and beef roasts. Easy to Clean The microwave does a great job on what I used it for most; popcorn and heating leftovers.
customer_reviews.author: farmer cindy

customer_reviews.title: I think manufacturing Defect noise when you put on convection the fan make noise
customer_reviews.text: amazon customer service the told me to they will follow up my case but not on first day the promise waiting for them how they do it on further chat they still want me wait till they get in touch with manufacture very bad service. even amazon customer service cannot contact them I think it manufacturing Defect noise when you put on convection the fan make noise as if touch the metal body of frame which is not easy for us to fix it and scary too
customer_reviews.author: tk

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: I had my last Convection/Microwave for 35 years, so this had some big shoes to fill. It does not have all the features of my old one and is harder to operate (meaning I had to read the directions!) I love the feature that to microwave 1-6 minutes you just push the number. It was when I wanted 10 minutes that I had to read the instructions! We are getting used to each other and hopefully, we are in for a long relationship! :)
customer_reviews.author: Jim Edwards

customer_reviews.title: Great price, and nice to not heat a full oven for small things
customer_reviews.text: I had a similar microwave to this years ago in Britain, but they've been prohibitively expensive since I moved to the US a decade ago. I was so happy to find this when my regular microwave broke! I am Mum in a family of 5, but still find a smaller oven space is plenty for a lot of our cooking, and like being able to not heat up the entire big oven for just a pie or a loaf of bread. Everything I've tried cooking in it has worked well. Living in the south, it's nice to not have the extra heat of the full oven on hot days (which means most days!)
customer_reviews.author: J Mac

customer_reviews.title: very loud humming noise
customer_reviews.text: To be fair, it is nice looking microwave. However, the humming noise is loud. Much louder than my old sharp microwave. I know microwave make humming noise but should not be that loud. There is no sound barrier between the magnetron circuit and outside metal. When it is on, the whole first floor can hear it.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Too weak to cook a small pork roast, ok to bake biscuits with
customer_reviews.text: I had a convection microwave in my last motor home, so I was familiar with how they should work. I could cook anything in the motor home, but sadly this one is too weak to cook even a small pork roast. I put together the roast, preheated the oven and in two hours it was still not cooked. The potatoes and carrots were drying out and crunchy - after two hours! When you get it preheated it struggles to maintain that heat. It looks nice and the microwave works well, but this is not the countertop oven you are looking for, and it sure isn't worth nearly double what I paid for it last year. Pass.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: nice quality, easy to use, versatile
customer_reviews.text: I really like this machine. It cooks, quickly, evenly and quietly. It's pretty easy to use and is very versatile, can do combo cooking (micro/convection). The only improvement I can think of is, I wish it had heating elements top AND Bottom for convection and grilling. This has top only, still very nice and efficient.
customer_reviews.author: Roy A. Neal

customer_reviews.title: Broken out of the box!
customer_reviews.text: Just unboxed my brand new oven, plugged it in and nothing happened. The plug is good as I plugged other things into it. Tried another plug and it threw a spark and blew a fuse. Tried calling the help line and they just closed.
customer_reviews.author: Reviewer

customer_reviews.title: Way deeper than you'd expect,  convection function is kind of pointless.
customer_reviews.text: As a microwave it's pretty good, it microwaves things. But for one thing it's way deeper than expected, there's a big projection at the rear several inches behind the main shell. And the convection feature.. well, it works. Like if you absolutely have to have one and only one kitchen heating appliance then I guess this thing can be used for both kinds of cooking. But it's not a very good convection oven. Wouldn't buy it again. I don't like abusing return policies or else I'd return this one actually. Bleh.
customer_reviews.author: Some Human

customer_reviews.title: Won't stop beeping long after food is removed
customer_reviews.text: I like the look of this appliance. One thing I don't like is long after the food/beverage has been removed the appliance randomly beeps. It's gotten worse as time goes on. Tonight after warming up food, taking it out the beeping went on for 10 mins. I have hit the end stop button even though this is not needed. Other than that it's a good oven.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Smith

customer_reviews.title: Bulb goes out...you are out of luck
customer_reviews.text: As I have remarked elsewhere for this product, it looks nice enough, does what a microwave is supposed to do, not too noisy and a slow, but serviceable oven. Bulb starts flickering in the 13th month and goes out. No replacement available according to Toshiba, referred to a third party (Repair Clinic) who have no replacement parts, and final recommendation from Toshiba: "Discard the appliance and buy a new one". I don't normally rant about products - but this is terrible business practice and design - out of warranty, no replacement part, nothing we can really do...except buy a new one.
customer_reviews.author: GS

customer_reviews.title: READ THE INSTRUCTIONS
customer_reviews.text: First off, it looks great with the S.S. outer covering.!! Works fantastic.! Haven't used it for all available cooking settings.!(Yet) At this point, I would Highly Recommend this Unit.!!! ***The ONLY complaint I have is the plastic covering over the Control Panel is peeling off already.!!! It actually began by the end of the first month.!!*** W.I.P. Jr.
customer_reviews.author: Armymedic

customer_reviews.title: Oven and microwave in one
customer_reviews.text: Super easy and convenient. I had a similar model when I rented an apartment so when I moved into my house I just had to have a convection microwave. It cleans as easy as a normal microwave with the added benefit of a mini oven. Not too loud, I think it's a normal level for a microwave. It came packaged very well, no dents, scratches or other problems. Double boxed and styrofoam protected. It is pretty heavy and awkward in the box but not too bad when putting it on my counter. I hope this has a long life and no issues
customer_reviews.author: Katy

customer_reviews.title: How to use power level.
customer_reviews.text: The power level instructions are wrong or possibly just very very unclear. Call toshiba? Don't bother. You will be disappointed. Their current number is now for tvs and laptops. As far as I can determine there is not a number for microwave support. I was rerouted to a paid service. Anyway to use power level cooking press micro (top left) enter time, then power level, then a number (eg. 5 for 50% power) then start. Why a rating of 2? Support is a comedy.
customer_reviews.author: MW

customer_reviews.title: Better than my expectations
customer_reviews.text: Based on my experience w/ two Toshiba laptops (the two worst PC I have ever owned in >30 yrs) I expected little from this MW but the price was too tempting not to use this as a temporary fix. After two months of daily usage I'm glad to report the unit has far exceeded our expectations. Not the fastest in reaching conv. oven temps (what MW/Conv oven is?), temps area are accurate against my oven thermometer) and all other functions work as documented. We will keep this oven as our b/u when and if > two ovens are needed.
customer_reviews.author: Tom Judge

customer_reviews.title: It appears to be OK, if it can survive shipping without damage.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the oven and the first one was dented and the turntable ring was broken. I returned it for a second one and it is dented in about the same place as the first one, but it appears to be functional, so I think I will keep it to avoid the trouble of re-packing and shipping. I don't have confidence that a third one will be any better. The packaging appears that it should be adequate in most cases, but it might be possible to make improvements to make it better able to withstand shipping abuse.
customer_reviews.author: George Griffin

customer_reviews.title: Toshiba EC042A5C-BS Microwave Oven with Convection Function Smart Sensor and LED Lighting
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this at the end of October and haven't had it for 5 months and the wonderful lights have gone out, I l know they are only lights but I truly liked, they truly made it easier taking a hot pan out of it. I have also read that it's a major deal to replace the bulb at that point I'm not sure it will ever have working lights again. Thanks, Songbird
customer_reviews.author: Songbird

customer_reviews.title: No one who values their money should buy this.
customer_reviews.text: This thing is a waste of time, total garbage. A big fail because you have to wait for it to pre heat to 100% before you can use it!!!! Meaning you basically gotta stand there for 10-12min until it beeps before you can even SET THE TIME. A Tostinos pizza takes about 30 mintues total and wasted a ton of electricity compared to a 30$ toaster oven which allows you to just set a time and walk away, literally takes less then half the time because it starts cooking while it preheats. Lame lame lame.
customer_reviews.author: sue

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't heat up the kitchen even using convection! Works great
customer_reviews.author: JoAnne Heffington

customer_reviews.title: Light went dim. It does not illuminate the food being cooked.
customer_reviews.text: After a few months the light failed. The problem is still unresolved. Toshiba customer service says the bulb is not replaceable. Really?. Bought it through amazon in October 2018. By mid 2019 the light went dim. It does not illuminate. You can tell is not off if you look at the bulb through the little holes square. Can I fix it myself? What options do I have? Without a light the oven is practically useless.
customer_reviews.author: A F.

customer_reviews.title: GREAT UNIT!
customer_reviews.text: Clear straight forward operation. Nice size. Arrived intact quickly. Lot of value for the money spent. Box plus it's inner protective box was about 2 feet x 2 feet x 1.5 feet at 50 pounds. My chef (wife) is in heaven enjoying her new unit! Appears to be very nice quality with plenty of room inside the all shiny stainless interior. The element for convection cooking is above the space in a recessed area giving considerable room inside the unit. Thank You Amazon for a great deal! And a happy Better half! rated as the best table top unit we agree!
customer_reviews.author: Kapenapuko

customer_reviews.title: 3 months barely used, I need to call Toshiba for service
customer_reviews.text: I've only had this unit for 3 months barely used. It's making an awful noise when it turns. Now I have to contact Toshiba for service. Not good!
customer_reviews.author: Bea

customer_reviews.title: Great appliance that looks great and actually works well!
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent convection microwave, with everything working as it should...it does an especially great job in defrosting without cooking the food compared to my previous microwaves...and the combi function really works well, letting you cook a 5 lb chicken moist with crispy skin ...the only drawback is it does take a long time to preheat in convection...about 15 min to get to 350, so much longer than most countertop ovens.
customer_reviews.author: Philo

customer_reviews.title: Very little information about using all available functions and actually cook meals. .
customer_reviews.text: Microwaves well, but it's user manual is a small pamphlet that gives almost no detail about how to actually take advantage of it's dual purpose microwave, convection, and combo cooking. If you have no experience with these appliances, you'll have to do tons of research to learn how to use it to it's full potential from videos and articles by people who have similar devices. Manufacturer's website is no help.
customer_reviews.author: J. Pieper

customer_reviews.title: Good microwave, not so much for convection oven
customer_reviews.text: Been happy with the microwave at the price point. With the convection oven, it does not actually fully heat up to the temperature selected and the top temperature is less than 400 degrees. Controls for baking are a little difficult as well.
customer_reviews.author: B. Loewy

customer_reviews.title: Toshiba Microwave problems
customer_reviews.text: We had tis for 4 months and the light inside started flickering - I called the customer service # and they said not to use it anymore and they wanted the receipt from Amazon- for a refund- we'll se how that goes- we only used the convection part a couple of times and it took a long time and the outside of the oven got really hot- Microwave worked ok- I would not buy this again-
customer_reviews.author: mark van hook

customer_reviews.title: Not noisy and can hide the clock
customer_reviews.text: This microwave/convec has a mute feature so you don't have to listen to keypad beeps. Also has an eco feature to hide the display. However, you need to do the eco option every time you use the machine, rather than a permanent feature, which is simply pressing the stop button one more time after the door is closed. The microwave was delivered by UPS in a pristine box, everything arrived in good shape. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: sfhijinx

customer_reviews.title: Very satisfied
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this to replace a Ge Profile convection-micro oven that stopped working. It was 1/3 the price of the Ge Profile. I have been impressed that for this price I have a new oven that works better than the old Ge. I use this oven on a daily bases to roast, bake, defrost, and reheat it has exceeded my expectations. The Fact is I just bought a second one for my quilting cottage and still cost less than it would have cost had I bought another Ge. The only draw back is that it only comes in one color, but for the difference in price I can live with it.
customer_reviews.author: Kitty

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Oven
customer_reviews.text: I bake a lot and we are in an rv for a few months so I decided to try this instead of the tiny rv oven. Pies and muffins have come out to perfection. ***Use a good oven thermometer as oven runs about 25 degrees cooler than set temperature.
customer_reviews.author: K Gallagher

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t work, Amazon was fantastic
customer_reviews.text: Tried it twice. First time on a baked potato it was fine. Second time it smelled like burned plastic and the side of the oven looked dented. I contacted amazon and they were wonderful to work with and I was able to get an amazon credit with the help of a wonderful customer support representative.
customer_reviews.author: Bindi

customer_reviews.title: Can't multi-task with this unit.
customer_reviews.text: The only reason I rated this unit as a 4 rather than a 5 is because the user is unable to use another microwave function when using the timer. For example, when I'm using the timer for something not related to the microwave (i.e. keeping track of how long I'm cooking something on my stove top) I am not able to go ahead and use the microwave for anything until the timer is off. Often times I end up changing the balance of the time to a mechanical timer and that, then, frees up the microwave for use. Very frustrating. No issues other than that. May sound trivial but it's a pain.
customer_reviews.author: Betty M.

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY
customer_reviews.text: Purchased 11-19-2019 Quit working on 5-11-2020. Junk. Says 1 year warranty but I have to pack it up and send back to company, preferably in original box and I assume I pay freight! Who keeps original box! I contacted company who had all my information and paperwork. I am hoping to be reimbursed. The company was to contact me on Friday 5-15-2020 however no one did. I did receive a refund today 5.26.2020 as Toshiba promised. Customer service was very helpful.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda Gaddie

customer_reviews.title: Yes it bakes! Yes you can use metal pans!
customer_reviews.text: This guy has entirely replaced my old microwave and toaster oven in my camper. Super satisfied so far. Have already baked a few cakes in here. Experimenting with different cake pans and will try to bake homemade pizza in it soon. Baking 25° lower than recipe calls for has gotten me great results. Yes you can use metal pans in this microwave. ON CONVECTION SETTING ONLY! 1 downside is it's on the larger side and quite heavy. But it fits things my toaster oven couldn't. So good tradeoff I think
customer_reviews.author: Cesar R. Lopez

customer_reviews.title: convection cooking very inefficient
customer_reviews.text: When I tried to bake a cake per package directions that should take about 30-35 minutes at 350, it takes almost an hour. When I use the auto roast feature it takes at least a half hour to reach the temperature. There is a grill with no instructions on how to use it. Vey unhappy with.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Does not heat properly
customer_reviews.text: After noticing that pizzas needed almost double the suggested times to be adequately cooked, I measured the temp and found that the setting of 424 degrees gives a temperature of 350 degrees. Is this unit defective or is it the way they are built?
customer_reviews.author: gZaller

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous
customer_reviews.text: I needed a microwave to replace my ancient of days microwave, which had stopped cooking on one side and no longer rotated the glass plate (among many other indications of age) and did some research before realizing I'd like to try something a little different. The convection oven combo is actually a real treat to work with - as in, I baked some cookies successfully and the microwave worked from the get-go. Lovely machine. Note: The LED light is bright enough to see by at night. All in all, I'm super satisfied and look forward to years of enjoyment. Thumbs up.
customer_reviews.author: Katrina Blau

customer_reviews.title: broke
customer_reviews.text: It stopped working and I was told I could not get a replacement
customer_reviews.author: Deann

customer_reviews.title: Turntable issues
customer_reviews.text: I called up Amazon about this and they put me in touch with the manufacturer distributor and I believe they’re going to give me a rebate. The turntable makes a lot of noise and operates jerk all day and then it’ll start running perfectly in quietly. Is this the kind of thing but you want to have in your home when it’s only a month or two old and it’s already growling?
customer_reviews.author: Fire Boy

customer_reviews.title: Looks Great and is a real Improvement in My kitchen
customer_reviews.text: Just got it and have to read up on all the features... Easy so far & seems to function well A Quick edit // after owning it for a few days... I would still recommend it but... The filament for the convection mode(s) is hard fastened to the ceiling of the unit and When (not if ) food explodes it is hard to clean : )
customer_reviews.author: DanO

customer_reviews.title: power level does not work ! don't buy this
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't anyone test these new microwave ovens at the factory ? Out of the box it doesn't work. To make matters worse Amazon expects me to pay the shipping cost to return the defective Toshiba microwave.
customer_reviews.author: clamdigger

customer_reviews.title: Good microwave, bad light bulb.
customer_reviews.text: I have it four stars because the light went out within the first week. I called Amazon, however, and they issued me a credit of $30 to get the bulb replaced. Thank you, Amazon!
customer_reviews.author: Skin musk

customer_reviews.title: Complicated but good
customer_reviews.text: This is not the easiest convection oven to use primarily because the instructions are not written very clearly. Some of this you have to figure out as you go, especially if you are using the convection baking mode. And it is much slower to heat up to the oven temperature you want in the convection mode, but otherwise a great product for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Beverly B.

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with this purchase. It is easy to use as microwave and as convection oven. It’s great to have both functions in a single tool. The size is good. It looks good and is good quality. This was much more economical than most others that are listed on Amazon. Shipping was fast and the product was packaged well to avoid any damage. Very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: JoAnn Adams

customer_reviews.title: Terrible  Purchase,Not Recommended
customer_reviews.text: This product did not work. I called. Had to send them a picture of the order and proof of receipt. That was in February. It is now August and not one word from Samsung. Awful service. Do not recommend thus product!
customer_reviews.author: Peggy Alys Rhoads

customer_reviews.title: Interior light is unreliable and cannot be replaced
customer_reviews.text: First microwave/convection oven I've owned so touch pad not intuitive, but easy to learn to use. Nice features. Warning: Not recommended. After 8 months the interior light stopped working except for occasional flicker. Called and was told it is and LED which is embedded into the circuitry and cannot be replaced by me or repaired by a technician. Since the machine was still under warranty received full refund without having to return it. If this well-known malfunction (folks I talked to knew of the problem even before I told them) had occurred several months later the warranty would have expired.
customer_reviews.author: Deepsky1

customer_reviews.title: Not great if you're trying to take the place of a conventional microwave and a toaster oven
customer_reviews.text: I ended up returning this because my original microwave just needed to have the outlet switched. The few times I used this it was uneventful. The toaster oven feature takes way too long to get going compared to my stand alone toastmaster. Another thing that I thought was odd was that it emitted a high pitch noise when not in use but plugged in. I unplugged it, no noise, plugged it back in, noise. So it was for sure coming from the microwave. I think sticking with a regular microwave and a dedicated toaster oven is the right way for me personally
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wow so nice
customer_reviews.text: This thing is awesome. I just recieved it and ive been working with a very low level microwave for ever. But this thing is so nice and quite and sleek looking. A but bigger then im use to. But everything is super easy. Even setting the clock!! I'll update if i have any issues.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT PURCHASE THIS MICROWAVE!!!
customer_reviews.text: Mine is just out of warranty and the lightbulb died. Midea, the manufacture, says I need to hire a technician to come and repair it. If it was in warranty, they would refund the price of the machine!! A lightbulb! Do not buy this machine under any circumstances. And, if you’re buying a Toshiba, make sure you can change the lightbulb.
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa Hale

customer_reviews.title: Great oven for the money
customer_reviews.text: I use it mostly for thawing, reheating,baked potatoes and TV dinners. The only thing I find annoying is the clock setting I happen to live where we get flash outages for a second and of course all the digital clocks on everything go off, this oven to set the clock you have to hold the button till it flashes then set the time and if the time isn't set it doesn't start.
customer_reviews.author: M. Weintraub

customer_reviews.title: Not what I expected.
customer_reviews.text: The unit looks nice and it is easy to clean. The microwave works fine but the convection oven is terrible. Cookies had to bake twice as long and came out too crunchy. Brownies had to be cooked twice as long as directed and were still not cooked in middle while overcooked on edges. Macaroni and cheese definitely did not bake well. Came out all dried up. Also when using the oven, the left outside and back gets very hot...can’t hardly touch it. This is a safety hazard when my little grandchildren are around. Overall disappointing product.
customer_reviews.author: Mary T. Manka

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: I didn't expect it to be this good. It's a microwave/convection oven which you can also cook using both at the same time. It's quiet and fast, very convenient and I am very impressed with it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Convection option unacceptable
customer_reviews.text: The convection option on this oven is terrible. I find I have to cook things for much longer than I should. For example, cooking muffins that require 350• for 15 minutes needed 375• for 25 minutes. Not satisfied with that option. Microwave works fine but I haven’t had any success with the comb option either.
customer_reviews.author: Cazielins

customer_reviews.title: led failure and no response from customer service
customer_reviews.text: seven months after purchase the interior led light only flickers. e-mailed customer service as directed in manual. two weeks later and NO response. wanted a multi purpose appliance due to shortage of counter space. not sure if I made a wise purchase.
customer_reviews.author: nortinnh

customer_reviews.title: Motor malfunctioning after about 2 months of actual use!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this unit 13 1/2 months ago for a vacation home. After getting used to the controls, I have been satisfied with it, although the microwave is not as powerful as others I have owned. Now after only about 2 months of actual use time, the turntable has started to rotate in an uneven jerky motion, indicating that the motor is malfunctioning, based on the conclusion of the customer service rep I spoke with. Despite the limited amount of use, it is beyond the 1 year warrantee period, so I am out of luck for any remedy from Toshiba! Very disappointing!!
customer_reviews.author: Lee S.

customer_reviews.title: Strong learning curve with little instructions.
customer_reviews.text: This microwave convection oven is more compact than the monster I used to have. It's also more powerful with less wattage, though I don't understand how! The fact that it can do so many things, and technology has changed so much since I last got a new microwave (18 years!) makes it difficult. I have to play with it for a while yet to get the full range of benefits this appliance can offer. I love it so far!
customer_reviews.author: A. Grillo

customer_reviews.title: buttons are small
customer_reviews.text: Getting used to the new oven, but note the buttons are overly small... certainly smaller than expected. I have normal hand size and have owned many microwaves and digital ovens, and this has the smallest buttons of any. Does seem to heat up well with microwave and look is good with the brushed SS.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Peebles

customer_reviews.title: too much racket, and electrical function does not work properly
customer_reviews.text: microwave and convection ovens seem to work OK, but while working its very loud. During a work function if you place your hand on the right side of the oven it quiets the noise and when I moved the unit o place it in a better position on the cabinet shelf it seems to completely erase anything on the screen ( clock or operating time) The first time I used it to cook a meal, I had to reset the clock five times. It was aggravating.
customer_reviews.author: willcurl

customer_reviews.title: Great, but needs rubber feet.
customer_reviews.text: I love the dual microwave and convection ability. Tailor made for reheating french fries! But this big beautiful machine slides around on my counter on its hard plastic feet. Some rubber feet to fix it in place and would have been five stars. I intend to add a dab of silicone to fix.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: MASSIVE but perfect
customer_reviews.text: Purchased after my last one wasn't cutting it. This thing is huge and amazing. It fits everything and cooks it just as well. The inside is so easy to clean, even the heating coil. I've had people come over and comment how when it is cooking, you can hardly tell it's on. The quiet feature would be great for families with young kids when needing to heat a meal or bottle. The size is massive, but worth it. Not only does it heat evenly with just the microwave setting, the combination setting means I can reheat any bread product and not get it dried and hard.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Intruction book
customer_reviews.text: The convection oven would not get above 320 Degrees , as oven thermometer placed in the oven recorded and it took too long to get to that. I baked muffins and it only reached 350 at the end of the baking time. No guide for the use of the Combination feature likewise for the Convecion oven. I would have liked some hints for use.
customer_reviews.author: painterbj

customer_reviews.title: Convection/microwave at an affordable price
customer_reviews.text: I got this to replace an older Amana model that I've had for about 18 years. It was hard to find one with all the feature the Amana had but this one did and it was much cheaper than my old one. It has many of the same presets and I enjoy having the ease of microwaving and the quality of the bake you have with a convection oven. I missed that as my old one wore out. And this one also fit the cabinet space that was build for my old one so win/win/win!
customer_reviews.author: Linda Hillemann

customer_reviews.title: The perfect combo oven...period!
customer_reviews.text: The Best Buy I have made in a long time. Perfect combo. I use it daily and can’t imagine not having it. Vary quiet..this oven does it all. Left overs taste great using this oven. Pizza...frys...steaks..top quality in every way..
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth Lemke

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing purchase.
customer_reviews.text: Liked the size. Dislike the fact that it is noisy, very slow to heat up on convection oven, microwave operation is much slower than old unit. Purchased it with hopes of using oven for hot weather but it takes much longer to bake anything so use stove oven. Had an older convection/microwave and it was great so am very disappointed with this unit. Would not recommend purchasing this unit with hopes of having convection oven.
customer_reviews.author: DJ

customer_reviews.title: Nope was hoping for more
customer_reviews.text: Convection oven takes longer & requires higher temps then your average frozen good requires. Microwave takes longer than last one we had. Looks great, & haven't tried to clean yet but looks like it's gonna be a birch... No cup of water is gonna soften staying on silver interior
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not a strong 1100  microwave,  I think mine might be defective. The convection oven rocks thohgh
customer_reviews.text: Convection oven is a lil hard to figure out , but once you do, it's a great lol oven. The microwave is useless, we wish we would have just bought a $60 microwave , that's all we needed to replace, but we wanted to step are game up and went with the covection/micro combo and not happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: david dickens

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: It works great, but need to try out the different options it offers. I found the instruction manual to be lacking since this is the first combo micro/conv oven I have used. I went online and found several youtube videos on this model which helped a lot. I was disappointed it did not come with some recipes to help with using the convection and dual cooking modes. Some examples would be very helpful if they would implement this in the future.
customer_reviews.author: EcoFriendly

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it’s advertisement
customer_reviews.text: The glass turntable broke after two weeks of limited use. Am on phone with Amazon customer support to determine how to get a replacement. The instructions with the microwave are horrible, very hard to understand. It took several attempts to figure out how to microwave or use the convection oven. The capacity doesn’t seem to be as advertised. This Toshiba replaces a Panasonic microwave oven that I used for more than 10 years. I would not buy recommend this product to others or buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Binder Woman

customer_reviews.title: Never worked right out of box
customer_reviews.text: We tried to adjust microwave thinking we were just doing things wrong with it, WE tried any way we could and never have gotten it to work right.One instance U layered strips of bacon and when I opened it to check it the entire strips of bacon were rolled up in a ball with the paper towel. It will cook only HALF the food and the other half is raw. I am currently trying to get it replaced with another brand,
customer_reviews.author: Melvin Benedict

customer_reviews.title: Stainless steel is very easy to wipe clean
customer_reviews.text: Best product for my kitchen I own and I own all of the newer products. Love the multifunction choices.
customer_reviews.author: John Straub

customer_reviews.title: Kindle help desk tried but failed.
customer_reviews.text: One hour on the phone. Help guy tried everything. No success. Got a refund for the Kindle book. What is wrong with Toshiba??
customer_reviews.author: Sid Rimmington

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality heating
customer_reviews.text: The microwave function has huge dead zones in the middle. Just about everything comes out half scalding and half frozen still. When doing pizzas the outside will be over cooked and the cheese in the middle will still have frost on it. The only thing can heat evenly is liquids.
customer_reviews.author: Matt S

product_meta.title: Toshiba EC042A5C-BS Countertop Microwave Oven with Convection, Smart Sensor, Sound On/Off Function and LCD Display, 1.5 Cu.ft, Black Stainless Steel
product_meta.description: Color:Black Stainless SteelThis Toshiba 1. 5 cu. Ft. 1000 watts microwave oven with its (black) stainless Steel finish and timeless look can match different kitchen styles. It features convection function with 4 auto bake menus & 4 Auto roast menus, sensor function with 13 auto menus, one touch popcorn button, easy defrosting by weight/time, microwave cooking with 10 power levels, warm hold function, express cook buttons for 1-6 mines and memory function. It is equipped with a bright LED cavity light, a glass turntable, energy saving ECO mode, mute button, clock and kitchen timer. The bright LED digital display, easy-to-read control panel and easy-to grip door handle further improve the user experience. The stainless steel cavity is scratch and rust resistant and is also easy to clean. for further information please kindly refer to the user manual and cook book provided as a PDF document below the product description section.
feature_bullets: Exterior dimensions: 21.73" w x 21.38" d x 12.83" h | Cavity: 15.5" w x 15.35" d x 10.2" h
Combines microwave and convection cooking in one appliance, with auto bake, defrosting and auto roast menus
Pre-programmed sensor menu for optimum result of popular foods like frozen pizza, vegetables and more
Sound on/off option: If you wish to mute the buzzer of the microwave, press and hold the button "8" on the keypad for 3-5 seconds. The buzzer is automatically switched off after a long beep.
One touch popcorn button and warm-hold function, equipped with power-saving eco mode, and child safety lock.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.2 out of 5 stars1,475 ratings4.2 out of 5 stars
